Job TitleThe Creation Platform is at the core of the Amadeus growth strategy, by powering the next generation travel ecosystem: it connects partners, suppliers, customers, and travelers, with solutions, capabilities, intelligence, and content; these will combine to power the traveler centric journeys of tomorrow.We are looking for a QA engineer to join our Creation Platform - Fast Data team. This platform touches all segments of our business such as reservations, ticketing, departure control, inventory or even airlines proprietary systems. It allows airlines to react in real-time to their operations, creating and running key use cases in a modern and highly serviceable environment. The key focus of this team is on the openness of our Fast Data capabilities – imagine giving a customer full self-serviceability over enhancing their products both at the core and the edge using developer Studios.Key Accountabilities:You will:1-) Implement test planDefine test cases from customer’s requirements and ensure traceability with specifications.
Write test plan (functional and/or non-functional and/or non-regression).
Ensure improvement of non-regression test repository in the Change Request plan.2-) Design and perform testsDesign/Write test cases.
Develop automation scripts (API).
Prepare test environment, test data, and execute test cases.
Prepare test execution report.
Give go/no-go for the customer’s test campaign.
Be responsible for the project, product or release quality control.3-) Problem Tracking RecordsProvide information to developers in order to fix defects.
Check defect fix and give go/no-go for the load of bug fixes to prod and test phases.
Record and track software defects.4-) Share your knowledgeParticipate in specification reviews to give input on testing requirements.
Report and communicate on test activities to the line organization, software developers and product definitions analysts.5-) Internal Policies and ProceduresEnsure the internal process and procedures are executed properly.
Strong sense of responsibility for company assets, be proactive against security vulnerabilities and breaches.Professional Skills:2+ year experience in testing software applications (API, UI).
Having knowledge of black box testing techniques.
Having knowledge in web and API technologies (Rest API, HTML, Javascript).
Hands on experience in scripting with proven automation frameworks (e.g. robot framework, selenium, playwright is a plus).
Experience in API testing (Rest, SOAP) with proven tools (e.g. SoapUI, Postman).
Using and maintaining testware (test cases, test scripts, test reports, test plans, etc) to measure and improve the quality of the software being tested. Testing embraces the planning, design, management, execution and reporting of tests, using appropriate testing tools and techniques and conforming to agreed standards to ensure that new and amended systems, configurations, packages, or services, together with any interfaces, perform as specified.
ISTQB certification (Foundation or Advanced Level) is a plus.
Strong written and verbal communications, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.
Ability to interact and communicate successfully with business partners and technology teams.Diversity & InclusionWe are an Equal Opportunity Employer and seek to hire the best candidate regardless of age, beliefs, disability, ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation.Job Details
